pages.title: Cognizance Conduit
pages.text: At the core of the Labyrinthine Archive lies the Cognizance Conduit—a singular, imposing device crafted from crystalline alloys and etched with ever-shifting runes. This device forms an interactive interface between the physical archive and a virtual realm of pure knowledge.

pages.title: Functions
pages.text: When activated, it establishes a neural connection with the user through arcane cables, transporting them into a pristine, crystalline space where the Archive’s living consciousness—The Intelligence of the Library—reveals ancient lore and prophetic visions. This conduit not only preserves forbidden knowledge but also serves as a gateway for transformation and insight.
